meanings.sent1: The copier mimicked the actions of its owner.
meanings.sent2: The copier in the office is always busy duplicating papers.
meanings.sent3: The copier at the library decided to start copying its own instructions.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like a copier, replicating every detail effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The copier at the store was as efficient as a busy bee, duplicating flyers in seconds.

meanings.definition: A machine that makes copies of documents or images
meanings.sent1: The office copier ran out of paper again.
meanings.sent2: She used the copier to duplicate the important report.
meanings.sent3: The copier at the school tried to copy a sandwich by mistake.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a copier, reproducing memories with precision.
meanings.sent5: The copier hummed softly as it replicated the colorful poster.
